item.title: 爱尔兰财政部称，人工智能应用已冲击毕业生就业岗位
item.description: 爱尔兰财政部研究发现，初步证据表明人工智能正在削弱该国技术导向型经济中某些领域的就业机会，特别是对年轻毕业生而言。【原文：Early evidence suggests artificial intelligence is weakening employment opportunities in some parts of Ireland's technology-focused economy, particularly for young graduates, research by Ireland's finance department found.】

item.title: 加拿大将加大对乌克兰能源领域的投资力度
item.description: 加拿大将加大对乌克兰能源领域的支持力度，与该国产业界合作，以优惠条件供应石油和天然气设备，并推动可再生能源投资。两国政府周三宣布了这一决定。【原文：Canada will step up support to Ukraine's energy sector, working with industry to supply oil and gas equipment on favourable terms and boost renewable energy investments, the two governments said on Wednesday.】

item.title: 微软将继续购买足够的可再生能源，以满足其全部电力需求。
item.description: 微软承诺将继续采购足够的可再生能源以满足其全部电力需求——去年该公司首次实现了这一目标。与此同时，科技巨头们正加大资本支出，推动由人工智能驱动的、对电力需求巨大的数据中心扩张。【原文：Microsoft has promised to keep buying enough renewable energy to match all its electricity needs after meeting that goal for the first time last year, as tech giants ramp up capital expenditure on an AI-fuelled expansion of power-hungry data centres.】

item.title: Snap的直接收入达到10亿美元的年化运行率，订阅用户突破2500万
item.description: Snap周三表示，其直接营收业务已实现10亿美元的年化营收运行率，这主要得益于Snapchat+订阅服务的增长。这家社交媒体公司正致力于开拓广告之外的新收入来源。【原文：Snap said on Wednesday its direct-revenue business has reached $1 billion in annualized revenue run rate, driven by growth in its Snapchat+ subscription service, as the social media company pushes into new income streams beyond advertising.】

item.title: 美国1月制造业产出创11个月来最大增幅
item.description: 美国1月份工厂产量创11个月来最大增幅，为长期受进口关税和高利率挤压的制造业带来希望。【原文：U.S. factory production increased by the most in 11 months in January, offering hope for a manufacturing sector that has been squeezed by import tariffs and high interest rates.】

item.title: 强生公司将在美国制造业振兴浪潮中斥资10亿美元新建宾夕法尼亚州工厂
item.description: 强生公司周三宣布，将投资逾10亿美元在宾夕法尼亚州新建一座细胞疗法设施。这是该公司去年宣布的扩大美国生产规模计划的一部分，旨在应对特朗普总统的关税威胁。【原文：Johnson & Johnson said on Wednesday it will invest more than $1 billion to build a new cell therapy facility in Pennsylvania, part of its larger plans announced last year to scale up U.S. manufacturing amid President Donald Trump's tariff threats.】

item.title: 特朗普顾问哈塞特建议对纽约联储研究人员进行惩处，因其在关税问题上持异议
item.description: 特朗普总统的高级经济顾问凯文·哈塞特周三表示，那些撰写纽约联邦储备银行研究报告的人员——该报告称关税成本主要由美国人承担——应该受到惩罚，因为他认为这些研究存在学术不端行为。【原文：Kevin Hassett, a top economic adviser to President Donald Trump, on Wednesday said those behind a New York Federal Reserve research paper that argued the costs of tariffs are borne mostly by Americans should be punished for what he described as shoddy scholarship.】

item.title: Trian基金的纳尔逊·佩尔茨表示温迪汉堡股价被低估
item.description: 激进投资者尼尔森·佩尔茨周三在提交给美国证券交易委员会的文件中表示，快餐连锁品牌温迪的股票目前被低估。【原文：Activist investor Nelson Peltz said in an SEC filing on Wednesday that the fast-food chain Wendy's stock is currently undervalued.】

item.title: 力拓集团取得加拿大内马斯卡锂业公司多数股权
item.description: 力拓集团周三宣布已获得加拿大内马斯卡锂业的多数股权，此举将推动其在魁北克省建设一体化锂业务的进程。【原文：Rio Tinto , said on Wednesday it has gained majority control of Canada's Nemaska Lithium, advancing its push to build an integrated lithium business in Quebec.】

item.title: 德国法院命令X公司为匈牙利选举研究提供数据访问权限
item.description: 德国上诉法院已命令社交媒体平台X向经审核的研究人员开放与匈牙利4月12日大选相关的公开数据，此举在争议性选举前为执行欧盟数字透明度规则树立了先例。【原文：A German appeals court has ordered social media platform X to give vetted researchers access to publicly available data linked to Hungary's April 12 election, setting a precedent for enforcing EU digital transparency rules ahead of a contentious vote.】

item.title: 特朗普撤销鼓励电动汽车生产以满足燃油经济性要求的法规
item.description: 特朗普政府周三宣布，将撤销一项鼓励汽车制造商通过夸大节能效果来生产电动汽车以满足燃油经济性要求的法规。【原文：The Trump administration said Wednesday it is rescinding a rule that incentivized automakers to produce electric vehicles to meet fuel economy requirements by overstating energy savings.】

item.title: 日抛型隐形眼镜有望推动2026年市场复苏
item.description: 隐形眼镜制造商在经历去年增速小幅放缓后，预计2026年将迎来更稳定的增长，这主要得益于高端日抛型隐形眼镜需求的上升以及全球视力矫正需求的增长。【原文：Contact lens makers are poised for steadier growth in 2026 after a slight slowdown in the previous year, banking on rising demand for premium daily disposables and increased vision correction needs globally.】

item.title: 沙特Humain公司向xAI的E轮融资注资30亿美元
item.description: 沙特阿拉伯人工智能公司Humain周三宣布，在SpaceX收购前夕，已向埃隆·马斯克的xAI公司投资30亿美元，作为其E轮融资的一部分。【原文：Saudi Arabia's Humain, the kingdom's artificial intelligence company, said on Wednesday it had invested $3 billion in Elon Musk's xAI as a part of its Series E funding round just prior to its acquisition by SpaceX.】

item.title: Starboard敦促Riot Platforms加快推进人工智能数据中心建设
item.description: 激进投资者Starboard Value周三敦促Riot Platforms加快推进人工智能数据中心交易，称这家比特币矿商已做好充分准备，能够把握人工智能基础设施需求激增带来的机遇。【原文：Activist investor Starboard Value on Wednesday pressed Riot Platforms to speed up AI data center deals, saying the bitcoin miner is well-positioned to capitalize on booming demand for artificial intelligence infrastructure.】

item.title: 美国银行为富裕客户提供艺术品咨询服务，因收藏家贷款需求增加
item.description: 美国银行正为其高净值客户推出艺术咨询服务，因为新一代收藏家的崛起正推动艺术拍卖市场的变革，同时越来越多的富裕客户开始将艺术品作为贷款抵押品。【原文：Bank of America is launching an art consulting service for its wealthy clients, as new generations of collectors command changes in art auctions and more wealthy clients are using their art as collateral for loans.】

item.title: 美国1月独栋住宅开工量回升，建筑许可下降
item.description: 美国独栋住宅建筑量在12月出现反弹，但未来建筑许可的减少表明，在抵押贷款利率和材料成本上升的背景下，市场存在潜在疲软。【原文：U.S. single-family homebuilding rebounded in December, but a decline in permits for future construction pointed to underlying weakness amid higher mortgage rates and material costs.】

item.title: 卡夫亨氏任命尼古拉斯·阿马亚为北美业务总裁
item.description: 卡夫亨氏公司周三任命前凯兰诺瓦公司高管尼古拉斯·阿马亚为北美业务总裁，此前该公司刚暂停了分拆计划一周。【原文：Kraft Heinz named former Kellanova executive Nicolas Amaya as president of its North America business on Wednesday, a week after hitting pause on its plans to split the company.】

item.title: 研究显示，非洲最大经济体引领稳定币需求增长
item.description: 一项调查发现，非洲两大经济体尼日利亚和南非正推动稳定币需求最强劲的增长，并对稳定币的潜力持最乐观态度。许多用户还希望稳定币能获得更广泛的接受。【原文：Africa's biggest economies Nigeria and South Africa are driving the strongest growth in demand for stablecoins and are the most optimistic about their potential, a survey found, with many users also wanting them to become more widely accepted.】

item.title: 美国12月核心资本货物订单和出货量稳健增长
item.description: 12月美国关键资本货物新订单增幅超预期，相关产品出货量激增，这进一步印证了经济学家的预期：第四季度企业设备投资保持强劲。【原文：New orders for key U.S.-manufactured capital goods increased more than expected in December and shipments of these products surged, cementing economists' expectations that business spending on equipment remained solid in the fourth quarter.】

item.title: 欧洲央行继任人选讨论将诺特和德科斯推上首席职位候选人名单
item.description: 西班牙和荷兰前央行行长被视为接替克里斯蒂娜·拉加德执掌欧洲央行的热门人选，此举很可能是一项更广泛的政治交易的一部分，最终两人或将同时获得重要职位。【原文：The former governors of the Spanish and Dutch central banks are seen as the front-runners to replace Christine Lagarde at the helm of the European Central Bank, likely in a broader political deal that could see both of them end up with a major job.】

item.title: 思科与Qunnect利用纽约光纤电缆构建量子网络
item.description: 思科系统公司与初创企业Qunnect周三宣布，双方已在纽约布鲁克林与曼哈顿之间建成并运营了一条量子网络。该网络通过真实的光纤电缆传输信号，其运行效果与实验室研究结果同样出色。【原文：Cisco Systems and startup Qunnect said on Wednesday that they have built and operated a quantum network between Brooklyn and Manhattan in New York which sends signals over real-world fiber optic cables and works as well as studies in labs.】

item.title: 加蓬以威胁安全与稳定为由暂停社交媒体服务
item.description: 加蓬媒体监管机构发表声明称，该国已暂停部分社交媒体平台的运营，理由是相关帖文可能破坏社会凝聚力，威胁机构稳定及国家安全。【原文：Gabon has suspended some social media platforms, citing concerns that posts could undermine social cohesion and threaten the stability of institutions and national security, the Central African country's media regulator said in a statement.】

item.title: Pinterest上调季度营收预期，tvScientific交易助力业绩增长
item.description: Pinterest（股票代码：PINS.N）周三宣布上调第一季度营收预期，此前该公司已完成对联网电视（CTV）广告平台tvScientific的收购。【原文：Pinterest PINS.N on Wednesday raised its forecast for first-quarter revenue after completing its acquisition of connected-TV (CTV) advertising platform tvScientific.】

item.title: 佳明预测年度业绩向好，得益于可穿戴设备需求强劲
item.description: 导航设备制造商佳明周三预测全年营收和利润将超出华尔街预期，主要得益于高端可穿戴设备和健身产品的强劲需求，其股价在盘前交易中上涨13%。【原文：Navigation device maker Garmin forecast annual revenue and profit above Wall Street estimates on Wednesday driven by strong demand for high-end wearables and fitness products, sending its shares up 13% in premarket trading.】

item.title: 全球支付公司股价飙升，季度利润增长且年度预测强劲
item.description: 全球支付公司周三公布财报，其全年盈利预期高于华尔街预期，且第四季度利润实现增长，推动这家支付技术公司的股价在盘前交易中上涨逾8%。【原文：Global Payments forecast annual earnings above Wall Street estimates and reported a rise in fourth-quarter profit on Wednesday, sending the payment technology firm's shares up over 8% in trading before the bell.】

item.title: 安纳特产品公司与诺华签署心血管项目许可协议
item.description: 非天然产品公司周三宣布，已与诺华公司签署许可协议，共同开发基于大环肽的治疗方案用于心血管项目。【原文：Unnatural Products said on Wednesday it has signed a licensing agreement with Novartis to develop macrocyclic peptide-based therapies for a cardiovascular program.】

item.title: 阿根廷海员发起48小时罢工抗议劳工改革
item.description: 阿根廷海员工会联合会（FESIMAF）周三发起为期48小时的罢工，该组织在声明中表示，此次罢工影响了货轮的运营。【原文：Argentine maritime workers from the country's maritime workers federation FESIMAF launched a 48-hour strike on Wednesday, affecting cargo vessel operations, the group said in a statement.】

item.title: 爱彼迎向国际足联世界杯主办城市的首次房东提供750美元奖励
item.description: 旅行租赁平台爱彼迎正推出750美元激励计划，旨在吸引北美16座城市的新房东加入。这些城市正为迎接2026年中期国际足联世界杯期间的数百万游客做准备。【原文：Travel rental platform Airbnb is rolling out a $750 incentive to attract new hosts in the 16 North American cities gearing up to welcome millions of visitors for the FIFA World Cup in mid-2026.】

item.title: 穆迪预测2026年盈利前景乐观，因信用评级需求强劲
item.description: 穆迪周三预测年度利润将超出预期，押注在债务发行激增的背景下，其信用评级业务将持续获得需求支撑。【原文：Moody's forecast annual profit above estimates on Wednesday, betting on sustained demand for its credit ratings amid surging debt issuance.】

item.title: 威瑞信季度利润超预期，得益于数据分析需求持续稳定
item.description: 维瑞斯克公司周三公布的第四季度利润超出华尔街预期，得益于其数据分析服务需求的持续稳定，该公司股价在盘前交易中上涨近10%。【原文：Verisk's fourth-quarter profit topped Wall Street expectations on Wednesday on the back of steady demand for its data analytics offerings, sending its shares up nearly 10% before the bell.】
